2.text: Place bacon slices on a broiler pan.

3.text: Place the broiler pan in the oven and set the temperature to 400℉ (205℃).
3.vid: /3/30/Cook Bacon in the Oven Step 3 Version 2.360p.mp4

4.text: Bake the bacon for 12-15 minutes on first side.

5.text: Remove the bacon from the oven.
5.vid: /f/f5/Cook Bacon in the Oven Step 5 Version 2.360p.mp4

6.text: Continue baking until the bacon is as crispy as you desire.

9.text: In a small bowl, combine the pepper and sugar with a whisk.
9.vid: /a/a3/Cook Bacon in the Oven Step 9 Version 2.360p.mp4

10.text: Lay the bacon slices on a baking sheet covered with aluminum foil.

11.text: Cover the bacon with another layer of aluminum foil.
11.vid: /f/f0/Cook Bacon in the Oven Step 11 Version 2.360p.mp4

12.text: Place the baking sheet in the oven and let the bacon cook for 15 minutes.

13.text: Remove the bacon from the oven when it is brown and crispy.

15.text: Wash the green beans and cut off their tips.
15.vid: /0/0b/Cook Bacon in the Oven Step 15 Version 2.360p.mp4

16.text: Place the beans in a large saucepan and fill it with water.

17.text: In the meantime, place the bacon on a microwave-safe plate.
17.vid: /d/d2/Cook Bacon in the Oven Step 17 Version 2.360p.mp4

18.text: Remove the green beans from the stove and drain them.
18.vid: /e/e0/Cook Bacon in the Oven Step 18 Version 2.360p.mp4

19.text: Grab a bunch of green beans and wrap a piece of bacon around it.
19.vid: /9/9f/Cook Bacon in the Oven Step 19 Version 2.360p.mp4

20.text: Mix the butter, soy sauce, garlic powder, pepper and brown sugar in a small bowl.
20.vid: /5/54/Cook Bacon in the Oven Step 20 Version 2.360p.mp4

21.text: Place the baking sheet or pan in the oven.
